trends: There have been no other sightings in erie
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It's was little scary at first but I felt a sense of being calm and nervous all at same time
divs: Sighting DetailsWell I was eating pizza with a friend up on there roof top,after I got down eating I had my cell phone in one hand and I had said to my friend waving my phone up to the sky hey maybe I'll get some response to a ufo not thinking anything I laughed, so my and my friend where star watching then we started making out, then out of no where i see this bright light oval shaped object came out of nowhere, like it was watching us or something it hovered in the sky it was pretty large I was very surprised I stood up with my friend putting my hand over my face cover my eyes from this bright lighted ufo object which glowed yellowish light which I've never seen anything like it befor in my life, it hoovered by us for about a minute then it did a 360 turn and was gone less than 10 second'. I will never forget what i saw I know it was a ufo.
